definition: Rukai, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
surname Kai
triumphant/victorious/chi (Greek letter Χχ)
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: And Jew's harp, Rukai tribes have long disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 與口簧琴，在魯凱族部落早已不見蹤影。
